sections: Own this exclusive American performance sedan.

Thanks to models like the CTS-V, the Cadillac name has once again become associated with performance and not simply luxury. Now is your chance to not only experience that excitement firsthand but to potentially
. Dream Giveaway is currently accepting charitable donations for you to
this high-performance sedan. Even better, as a Motorious reader you can have the number of your entries increased, giving you a far greater chance of

car, so you’d be getting an incredibly exclusive car a lot of people want. Those special graphics make it obvious to anyone who knows Cadillacs what this sedan is, so you’ll impress the right people if you win.

This car isn’t all about looks. No, the supercharged 6.2-liter V8 is the same engine used in the Z06 Corvette, putting 640 -horsepower and 630 lb.-ft. of torque at your command. An 8-speed automatic transmission with shift paddles helps you manage all that power with absolute precision. That means
this car could be your ticket to smoking many tires and countless good times.
The list of goodies included on this

is long. For example, there’s a carbon-fiber hood, 19-inch alloy wheels, and Michelin Pilot Super Sport tires included. A third-generation Magnetic Ride Control suspension provides the perfect blend of comfort and tight handling, while Brembo brakes help bring this high-powered ride to a halt in a hurry. You even can select different driving modes to change how this Caddie behaves, plus there’s a Launch Control system for quick starts in a race. All you have to do is enter to win this amazing car.
Don’t forget, as a Motorious reader you can bonus entries for your charitable donation and hopefully win this
. It’s our way of saying thanks for being a reader. Good luck!
